name: intgr-service.yml
configuration:
spring:
  application:
    name: nttm-intgr-service
  datasource:
    driver-class-name: org.postgresql.Driver
    url: "jdbc:postgresql://postgres-6260:5432/ttm_camunda?ApplicationName=nttm-intgr-service"
    username: "postgres"
    password: "1"
  jpa:
    database: postgresql
    hibernate:
      ddl-auto: none
    database-platform: org.hibernate.dialect.PostgreSQL95Dialect
    properties:
      hibernate:
        connection:
          release_mode: after_transaction
        temp:
          use_jdbc_metadata_defaults: false
  jmx:
    enabled: false
app:
  jwt:
    expire: ${JWT_EXPIRE:90000000} #90000000ms = 25hrs
    secret: ${JWT_SECRET_KEY:z%C*F-JaNdRgUkXn2r5u8x/A?D(G+KbPeShVmYq3s6v9y&E)H@McQfTjWnZr4h}
    server: http://nttm-auth-jwt-feature-ossttmb2b-6260:8080/nttm-auth-jwt/api/
server:
  port: 8286
management:
  endpoints:
    web:
      path-mapping:
        prometheus: metrics
      base-path: /
      exposure:
        include: prometheus
  health.solr.enabled: false
logging:
  config: classpath:log4j2-dev.yaml
  level:
    org.hibernate: error
    org.hibernate.SQL: error
    org.zalando.logbook: trace
logbook:
  format:
    style: http
  exclude:
    - "**/metrics"
nttm:
  prefix: "http://10.28.97.89:8080"
  suspendTime: 172800000
  sleepSeconds: 5
  backOffPeriod: 2000
  maxRetry: 6
  update:
    corePoolSize: 4
    maxPoolSize: 10
    keepAliveSeconds: 600
    queueCapacity: 100
